roleset.name: move swiftly
roleset.note: SCUD-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. Comparison with 'walk.' Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. Updated by julia, 11/2010. (from scud.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: She remembered , suddenly , a night of savage moonlight and scudding cloudswhen she and Adelia , [*-1] having dared each other , had stolen out of theirgreat safe house and come here , hand in hand , [*-1]hoping and fearing ghosts[*T*-2] .
